lead_paragraph: A bomber struck during a spiritual dance celebration at a Sufi shrine in the south, and the Islamic State claimed responsibility.

headline.main: Pakistan Shrine Bombing Kills Scores in Worst Attack in Months
headline.print_headline: At Least 70 Are Killed in Pakistan Shrine Blast
